identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

theme_strategy.reasoning: Forex trading requires long sessions; dark mode reduces eye strain and conveys institutional precision.

rules: Use JetBrains Mono for ALL numerical data and currency pairs (e.g., EUR/USD).
Use Plus Jakarta Sans for labels, navigation, and marketing copy.
Labels must be uppercase and wide: tracking-widest text-xs font-semibold.

usage_rules: Background is #0B0F1A. Do not use pure black.
Cards use #121826 with a 1px border of rgba(255,255,255,0.05).

layout.spacing: Compact but breathable. Use p-4 for cards, gap-4 for grids.
rules: Dashboard must fill the screen height (h-screen) with scrollable internal panels.
Sidebar navigation: Fixed width (w-64), collapsible on mobile.
Right panel: Contextual details (Pair Analysis) or Notifications.

SignalCard.description: Compact card displaying a trading signal.
SignalCard.structure: Header (Pair + Time), Body (Action: BUY/SELL + Confidence Score), Footer (Take Profit / Stop Loss).
SignalCard.style: Bordered, no shadow, subtle hover effect (border-primary/50).

ConfidenceMeter.style: Circular progress ring or thin progress bar. Color coded (Green > 70%, Yellow > 50%, Red < 50%).

DataGrid.style: Row hover effect (bg-white/5). Mono font for all cells. Right align numbers.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky headers or modal overlays. backdrop-blur-md bg-background/80.
visual_enhancers.gradients: NO background gradients. Use subtle 'glow' effects behind active charts.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid border-white/5 is mandatory for all cards to define structure in dark mode.

micro_interactions: Price Update Flash: Background flashes Green/Red briefly when price changes.
Hover Lift: Cards translate-y-[-2px] on hover.

hero_background.usage: Landing page hero section background with heavy overlay (bg-background/90).

trader_social_proof.usage: About section or 'Why Choose Us' section.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a data-testid attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the dashboard using the 'Control Room' grid layout. Prioritize data density and legibility. Use Recharts for visualizations. Ensure the 'Signal Card' component is the hero of the dashboard. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page. Strictly follow the color palette.
